page.title: 17DAILY LIFE
page.content: My name is Michael and I am 10 years Old. I set off for school at eight thirty. As the bell rings at nine o'clock I have plenty of time to play. After registration at nine fifteen we have assembly in the hall. Reading, English, Maths and break take us up to dinner time. I have a meal cooked in the School Kitchen but many of my friends take a packed lunch from home. After eating I go out to play with my friends. Then the bell goes at one thirty and I go in and sit down. Afternoons include Art and Craft, games, music and Project work lessons and end at three thirty when I go home. Sometimes I go swimming before tea and in the evening have football practice or Cub Scouts. I am usually home by eight and watch television until nine o'clock when I go to bed.
